merge_before_transcript:
phoebe: Oh, can I play too? I’ve never played football, like ever.
joey: Great, you can cover Chandler.
joey: Come on man! You never want to do anything since you and Janice broke up.
chandler_transcript: That’s not true! I wanted to wear my bathrobe and eat peanut clusters all day. I wanted to start drinking in the morning. Don’t say that I don’t have goals!
